A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: OK\, it doesn't have Jar Jar Binks\, so it isn't the worst movie of the franchise\, but it certainly is not one of the best.  The dialogue is atrocious!  It lacks any conversational element.  The gambling scene and the actions subsequent are wholly unnecessary to the plot and should have been excluded from the film.  The action flits back and forth between sub-plots and results in a very choppy movie.  I enjoyed it in the theatre when I watched it the first time\, despite the problems.  The video revealed the film's flaws when watched a second time.  As Yuri Karpov says in 2012: \"Not Good\"
